Metadata: Fellowships for the future: opportunities for career enhancement and academic growth (revised)

This revised educational pamphlet gives information on how fellowships and internships provide prime opportunities for graduate students to expand their research horizons and enhance their careers. The Washington Sea Grant Program has an exceptionally rich history of helping individuals become fellows and interns and, in the process, has helped shape the future of ocean science and marine policy, both nationally and internationallyâ€‹.
